item.name: $batch, POST, PATCH and two GET requests

body.raw:
--batch_a8ba333b-34b7-4699-bdfa-af8d46dbbcbf
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

POST http://localhost:5000/odata/People(2)/VinylRecords HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json

{
  "Title": "Communion",
  "Artist": "Years and Years",
  "CatalogNumber": "IOP/757",
  "Year": 2015,
  "PressingDetailId": 1
}

--batch_a8ba333b-34b7-4699-bdfa-af8d46dbbcbf
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

PATCH http://localhost:5000/odata/People(1)/VinylRecords(1) HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json

{
  "Title": "Nevermind Updated"
}

--batch_a8ba333b-34b7-4699-bdfa-af8d46dbbcbf
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

GET http://localhost:5000/odata/People(1)/VinylRecords HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--batch_a8ba333b-34b7-4699-bdfa-af8d46dbbcbf
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary

GET http://localhost:5000/odata/People(2)/VinylRecords HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--batch_a8ba333b-34b7-4699-bdfa-af8d46dbbcbf--
